dk.danskebank.mobilepay.sdk

Class MobilePay

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.danskebank.mobilepay.sdk.MobilePay

  • public class MobilePay
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton for starting a MobilePay payment

    NOTE: init(String) method must be called before any other method.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MobilePay getInstance()
        Returns singleton class instance.
        Returns:
        MobilePay singleton instance

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String merchantId,
                 byte[] hmacKey,
                 Country country)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes MobilePay instance with MerchantId and key. This will reset all previous parameters.

        NOTE: Use init(String), unless you have a very good reason for setting your own HMAC.

        Parameters:
        merchantId - the key identifying your app
        hmacKey - a key used for validation (set to null to auto-generate)
        country - denotes which country specific MobilePay app you want to target
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if merchantId parameter is invalid

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String merchantId)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes MobilePay instance with MerchantId. This will reset all previous parameters.
        Parameters:
        merchantId - the key identifying your app
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if merchantId parameter is null or invalid

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String merchantId,
                 Country country)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes MobilePay instance with MerchantId. This will reset all previous parameters.
        Parameters:
        merchantId - the key identifying your app
        country - denotes which country specific MobilePay app you want to target
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if merchantId parameter is invalid

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String merchantId,
                 byte[] hmacKey)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes MobilePay instance with MerchantId. This will reset all previous parameters.
        Parameters:
        merchantId - the key identifying your app
        hmacKey - a key used for validation (set to null to auto-generate)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if merchantId parameter is invalid

      • setCertificate

        public void setCertificate(byte[] certificate)
        Set the certificate.

        NOTE: This is only intended for development purposes. Do not use this method in a production environment.

        Parameters:
        certificate - the certificate to set

      • setPackageName

        public void setPackageName(java.lang.String packageName)
        Set the package name to use when creating the intent.

        NOTE: This is only intended for development purposes. Do not use this method in a production environment.

        Parameters:
        packageName - the package name

      • getPackageName

        public java.lang.String getPackageName()
        Returns the package name
        Returns:
        the package name

      • getReturnSeconds

        public int getReturnSeconds()
        Returns the number of seconds until MobilePay will switch back to the calling app.

        Default is 1 second.

        Returns:
        return time in seconds

      • setReturnSeconds

        public void setReturnSeconds(int returnSeconds)
        Set the number of seconds until MobilePay will switch back to the calling app.

        Default is 1 second.

        Parameters:
        returnSeconds - the number of seconds before switch

      • getTimeoutSeconds

        public int getTimeoutSeconds()
        Returns the number of seconds until a timeout error is returned to the caller.

        Default value is 0. If the value is 0 then there is no timeout.

        Returns:
        the number of seconds before a timeout occurs

      • setTimeoutSeconds

        public void setTimeoutSeconds(int timeoutSeconds)
        Set the number of seconds you allow the user to spend in the MobilePay app before returning. If exceeded, this error will be called when authenticating in MobilePay.

        Default value is 0. If the value is 0 then there is no timeout.

        Parameters:
        timeoutSeconds - the number of seconds before a timeout occurs

      • getSignatureVersion

        public int getSignatureVersion()
        Returns the signature version of the SDK. This can be used to make specific logic for each version, which can be useful when validating different signatures.
        Returns:
        the signature version of the SDK

      • getSDKVersion

        public java.lang.String getSDKVersion()
        Returns the SDK build version. The build version name is a human-readable string in the format major.minor.patch.
        Returns:
        the SDK build version

      • getSDKVersionCode

        public int getSDKVersionCode()
        Returns the SDK build version code. The version code is an integer incremented for each release.
        Returns:
        the SDK build version code

      • setCaptureType

        public void setCaptureType(CaptureType captureType)
        Determines the type of payment used. See CaptureType for possible pay types.

        Default value is CaptureType.CAPTURE

        Parameters:
        captureType - the payment type to use

      • getCaptureType

        public CaptureType getCaptureType()
        Determines the type of payment used. See CaptureType for possible pay types.

        Default value is CaptureType.CAPTURE

        Returns:
        the current payment type

      • hasActivePayment

        public boolean hasActivePayment()
        Determines if a payment is in progress. In essence this determines if handleResult(int, Intent, ResultCallback) was correctly called after createPaymentIntent(Payment).
        Returns:
        true if a payment is active and has not been completed

      • isInstantCapture

        @Deprecated
public boolean isInstantCapture()
        Deprecated. This function has been deprecated. Please use getCaptureType() instead.
        Determines if the payment is going to be a reservation or an instant capture.

        Default value is true.

        Returns:
        true if using instant capture, or false if using reservation

      • setInstantCapture

        @Deprecated
public void setInstantCapture(boolean capture)
        Deprecated. This function has been deprecated. Please use setCaptureType(CaptureType) instead.
        Determines if the payment is going to be a reservation or an instant capture.

        Default value is true.

        Parameters:
        capture - true if using instant capture.

      • createPaymentIntent

        public android.content.Intent createPaymentIntent(Payment payment)
                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                  java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Creates an Intent to open MobilePay and process a payment. Should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(android.content.Intent, int).
        Parameters:
        payment - the payment info send to MobilePay
        Returns:
        MobilePay payment intent
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if init(String) was not called before
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if payment parameter is null or has illegal arguments

      • handleResult

        public void handleResult(int resultCode,
                         android.content.Intent data,
                         ResultCallback callback)
        Call this when a result is returned from MobilePay. Should be used inside Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent) or Fragment.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent).
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Either Activity.RESULT_OK or Activity.RESULT_CANCELED
        data - delivered from MobilePay
        callback - to relay message to caller

      • createDownloadMobilePayIntent

        public android.content.Intent createDownloadMobilePayIntent(android.content.Context context)
                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an Intent used to open Google Play on the MobilePay details page. Should be used with Activity.startActivity(android.content.Intent).
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        Returns:
        the intent used to start Google Play
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if context parameter is null

      • isMobilePayInstalled

        public boolean isMobilePayInstalled(android.content.Context context)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Checks if MobilePay is installed on the device.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        Returns:
        true if MobilePay is present on the system matching the selected Country, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if context parameter is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if init(String) was not called before

      • isMobilePayInstalled

        public boolean isMobilePayInstalled(android.content.Context context,
                                    Country country)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Checks if MobilePay is installed on the device.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        country - denotes which country specific MobilePay app you want to target
        Returns:
        true if MobilePay is present on the system matching the selected Country, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if context parameter is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if init(String) was not called before
